argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fvmpt3.a | |- ( x = A -> B = C ) |
| 2 |  | fvmpt3.b | |- F = ( x e. D |-> B ) |
| 3 |  | fvmpt3.c | |- ( x e. D -> B e. V ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = A -> ( B e. V <-> C e. V ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 3 | #P_vtoclga | |- ( A e. D -> C e. V ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( A e. D /\ C e. V ) -> ( F ` A ) = C ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_mpdan | |- ( A e. D -> ( F ` A ) = C ) |
